name: Our Little Town of Cradyl
description:
To whom it may concern

We appreciate your cooperation to spend 30 days as temporary mayor for our beloved town of Cradyl.

The town currently houses 5 people, they begin in the house on the top left. Left click on buildings and the townsfolk to select them, and right click to move the townsfolk around. Right click on new houses to buy, then assign townsfolk to build them.

Setting people to work in the factory will generate money, which you can use to improve the town. Workers will gradually lose Approval in you. 

You can have more people than houses, but people left outside a house at night will not be happy. Two people left alone in a house during the day produces a third, new person.

If your overall average Approval sinks too low, you will be deposed, so keep Approval high by sending people to the tavern.

We are a close knit town - all will Despair should one of us die of old age, or any other reason. Praying at the church eases our Despair. One who succumbs to their Despair will inflict more on others.

Cradyl is a very special town. Please keep it alive.

Good luck.

The Council

----

Made for Ludum Dare 46 - Keep It Alive. Developed by SlapDash Games.

Didn't get the chance to playtest for balance - however definitely a challenging game.
